params.closeParams: is the struct with details on previous option and strike selection details
params.collateralAsset: is the address of the collateral asset
params.optionsPremiumPricer: is the address of the contract with the black-scholes premium calculation logic
params.premiumDiscount: is the vault's discount applied to the premium
params.strikeSelection: is the address of the contract with strike selection logic
params.vaultParams: is the struct with vault general data
params.vaultState: is the struct with vault accounting state

returns.delta: is the delta of the new option
returns.otokenAddress: is the address of the new option
returns.premium: is the premium of the new option
returns.strikePrice: is the strike price of the new option

params.depositAmount: is the amount of collateral to deposit
params.gammaController: is the address of the opyn controller contract
params.marginPool: is the address of the opyn margin contract which holds the collateral
params.oTokenAddress: is the address of the otoken to mint

params.currentBalance: is the total balance of the vault
params.currentShareSupply: is the total supply of shares
params.vaultParams: is the struct with vault general data
params.vaultState: is the struct with vault accounting state

returns.mintShares: is the amount of shares to mint from deposits
returns.newLockedAmount: is the amount of funds to allocate for the new round
returns.newPricePerShare: is the price per share of the new round
returns.queuedWithdrawAmount: is the amount of funds set aside for withdrawal

params.amount: is the amount of `asset` to withdraw
params.collateralToken: is the address of the collateral token
params.crvPool: is the address of the steth <-> eth pool on curve
params.minETHOut: is the minimum eth amount to receive from the swap

returns._0: amountETHOut is the amount of eth we have available for the withdrawal (may incur curve slippage)

params.collateralToken: is the address of the collateral token

returns._0: withdrawAmount is the withdraw amount in `collateralToken`

params.collateralToken: is the address of the collateral token

commitAndClose(address,address,uint256,V.notice: Sets the next option the vault will be shorting, and calculates its premium for the auction

createShort(address,address,address,uint.notice: Creates the actual Opyn short position by depositing collateral and minting otokens

rollover(uint256,uint256,Vault.VaultPara.notice: Calculate the shares to mint, new price per share, and amount of funds to re-allocate as collateral for the new round

transferAsset(address,uint256).notice: Helper function to make either an ETH transfer or ERC20 transfer

unwrapYieldToken(uint256,address,address.notice: Unwraps the necessary amount of the yield-bearing yearn token         and transfers amount to vault

withdrawYieldAndBaseToken(address,addres.notice: Withdraws stETH + ETH (if necessary) from vault using vault shares

wrapToYieldToken(address,address).notice: Wraps the necessary amount of the base token to the yield-bearing yearn token
